  4. Why an Oscars win for films like 'The Brutalist' or 'Emilia Pérez' could accelerate AI's march on Hollywood  Business Insider
  5. How AI was used in the making of some of this year’s Oscar favorites  PBS NewsHour

item.title: UK unions call for action to protect creative industry workers as AI develops - The Guardian
item.description:
1. UK unions call for action to protect creative industry workers as AI develops  The Guardian

  3. British musicians release a silent album to protest plans to let AI use their work  The Associated Press
  4. UK’s AI plans pose ‘existential threat’ to film studios, warns Bridget Jones producer  Financial Times
